title: A quick tour of ppgmmga
code: PP1D <- ppgmmga(data = X, d = 1, seed = 1) PP1D ## Call: ## ppgmmga(data = X, d = 1, seed = 1) ##  ## 'ppgmmga' object containing:  ## [1] "data"       "d"          "approx"     "GMM"        "GA"         ## [6] "Negentropy" "basis"      "Z" summary(PP1D) ## ── ppgmmga ─────────────────────────────  ##  ## Data dimensions               = 200 x 6  ## Data transformation           = center & scale  ## Projection subspace dimension = 1  ## GMM density estimate          = (VEE,4) ## Negentropy approximation      = UT  ## GA optimal negentropy         = 0.6345935  ## GA encoded basis solution:  ##            x1       x2       x3       x4       x5 ## [1,] 3.268902 2.373044 1.051365 0.313128 0.531718 ##  ## Estimated projection basis:  ##                 PP1 ## Length   -0.0119653 ## Left     -0.0934775 ## Right     0.1602105 ## Bottom    0.5740698 ## Top       0.3450346 ## Diagonal -0.7189203 ##  ## Monte Carlo Negentropy approximation check:  ##                            UT ## Approx Negentropy 0.634593544 ## MC Negentropy     0.633614256 ## MC se             0.002249545 ## Relative accuracy 1.001545559 plot(PP1D) plot(PP1D, class = Class)

title: A quick tour of ppgmmga
code: PP2D <- ppgmmga(data = X, d = 2, seed = 1) summary(PP2D) ## ── ppgmmga ─────────────────────────────  ##  ## Data dimensions               = 200 x 6  ## Data transformation           = center & scale  ## Projection subspace dimension = 2  ## GMM density estimate          = (VEE,4) ## Negentropy approximation      = UT  ## GA optimal negentropy         = 1.13624  ## GA encoded basis solution:  ##            x1       x2       x3       x4      x5      x6      x7      x8 ## [1,] 2.268667 2.929821 1.061407 1.084929 0.30443 3.85462 0.98329 1.11377 ##            x9      x10 ## [1,] 0.167174 1.668403 ##  ## Estimated projection basis:  ##                 PP1        PP2 ## Length   -0.0372687 -0.0718319 ## Left      0.0312555 -0.1198116 ## Right    -0.1548079  0.0630092 ## Bottom   -0.0856931  0.8639049 ## Top      -0.1024990  0.4603727 ## Diagonal  0.9776601  0.1350576 ##  ## Monte Carlo Negentropy approximation check:  ##                            UT ## Approx Negentropy 1.136240194 ## MC Negentropy     1.137260367 ## MC se             0.003527379 ## Relative accuracy 0.999102956 summary(PP2D$GMM) ## -------------------------------------------------------  ## Density estimation via Gaussian finite mixture modeling  ## -------------------------------------------------------  ##  ## Mclust VEE (ellipsoidal, equal shape and orientation) model with 4 components:  ##  ##  log-likelihood   n df       BIC       ICL ##       -1191.595 200 51 -2653.405 -2666.898 plot(PP2D$GA) plot(PP2D) plot(PP2D, class = Class, drawAxis = FALSE)

title: A quick tour of ppgmmga
code: PP3D <- ppgmmga(data = X, d = 3,                  center = TRUE, scale = FALSE,                  gatype = "gaisl",                  options = ppgmmga.options(numIslands = 2),                 seed = 1) summary(PP3D) ## ── ppgmmga ─────────────────────────────  ##  ## Data dimensions               = 200 x 6  ## Data transformation           = center  ## Projection subspace dimension = 3  ## GMM density estimate          = (VVE,3) ## Negentropy approximation      = UT  ## GA optimal negentropy         = 1.16915  ## GA encoded basis solution:  ##            x1      x2       x3       x4       x5       x6       x7       x8 ## [1,] 4.274545 2.47064 1.055677 1.022896 0.851247 4.924235 1.982288 2.039161 ##            x9      x10  ...       x14      x15 ## [1,] 1.939208 2.210582       1.548995 2.489197 ##  ## Estimated projection basis:  ##                 PP1        PP2        PP3 ## Length   -0.3145939  0.5612330 -0.5201907 ## Left     -0.1472768 -0.1498109 -0.3297848 ## Right     0.3043823  0.5008715 -0.3739875 ## Bottom    0.2818318  0.3353769  0.4238383 ## Top       0.3062895  0.4589957  0.3562206 ## Diagonal -0.7832300  0.2975690  0.4174266 ##  ## Monte Carlo Negentropy approximation check:  ##                           UT ## Approx Negentropy 1.16914962 ## MC Negentropy     1.17493505 ## MC se             0.00430878 ## Relative accuracy 0.99507596 plot(PP3D$GA) plot(PP3D) plot(PP3D, class = Class) plot(PP3D, dim = c(1,2)) plot(PP3D, dim = c(1,3), class = Class) # A rotating 3D plot can be obtained using if(!require("msir")) install.packages("msir") msir::spinplot(PP3D$Z, markby = Class,                 pch.points = c(20,17),                col.points = ppgmmga.options("classPlotColors")[1:2])

title: Default values for ppgmmga package — ppgmmga.options
text: function can used set retrieve values used ppgmmga package. function globally sets arguments current session R. default options restored new R session. temporarily change options single call ppgmmga function, look options argument ppgmmga. Available options : modelNames string specifying GMM fit. See mclustModelNames available models. G integer value vector integer values specifying number mixture components. single value provided, best model selected using BIC criterion. default G = 1:9. initMclust string specifying type initialisation used EM algorithm. See mclust.options details. popSize GA population size. default popSize = 100. pcrossover probability crossover. default pcrossover = 0.8. pmutation probability mutation. default pmutation = 0.1. maxiter integer value specifying maximum number iterations stopping GA. default maxiter = 1000. run integer value indicating number generations without improvment best value fitness fuction. run = 100. selection R function performing selection genetic operator. See ga_Selection details. default selection = gareal_lsSelection. crossover R function performing crossover genetic operator. See ga_Crossover details. default crossover = gareal_laCrossover. mutation R function performing mutation genetic operator. See ga_Mutation details. default mutation = gareal_raMutation. parallel logical value specifying whether GA run parallel. default parallel = FALSE. numIslands integer value specifying number islands used Island Genetic Algorithm. default numIslands = 4. migrationRate value specifying fraction migration islands. default migrationRate = 0.1. migrationInterval integer values specifying number generations run migration. default migrationInterval = 10. optim logical value specifying whether local search performed. default optim = TRUE. optimPoptim value specifying probability local search performed GA generation. default optimPoptim = 0.05. optimPressel value \([0,1]\) specifying pressure selection. Values close 1 tend assign higher selection probabilities solutions higher fitness, whereas values close 0 tend assign equal selection probability solution. default optimPressel = 0.5. optimMethod string specifying general-purpose optimisation method used local search. See optim available algorithms. default optimMethod = "L-BFGS-B". optimMaxit integer value specifying number iterations local search algorithm. default optimMaxit = 100. orth string specifying method employed orthogonalise matrix basis. Available methods QR decomposition "QR", Singular Value Decomposition "SVD". default orth = "QR". classPlotSymbols vector whose entries either integers corresponding graphics symbols single characters indicating classifications plotting data. Classes assigned symbols given order. classPlotColors vector whose entries correspond colors indicating classifications plotting data. Classes assigned colors given order. details options related Gaussian mixture modelling see densityMclust, related genetic algorithms see ga gaisl.
